title: Everytime I make a post with a poll in Player Behavior and Moderation I get ERROR 500. HELP
body:
nothing more to say.

Tried this both on mobile and desktop.

Changed IPs and played with settings enough to know it's the poll option bugging out. 2 days ago this function worked fine.

replies.body:
An error 500 can be caused by a number of things, but thankfully there are a couple of quick fixes that can take care of it. Go through and clear you browser history and cookies and that should get you going again.

You can check our [Clearing Browser History](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) page for tips on how to do so if you're unsure.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=G0v8wNyN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-24T02:37:31.927+0000)
>
> An error 500 can be caused by a number of things, but thankfully there are a couple of quick fixes that can take care of it. Go through and clear you browser history and cookies and that should get you going again.
> 
> You can check our [Clearing Browser History](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) page for tips on how to do so if you're unsure.

It did not work :(

I do not get this error if I leave off the poll. But the entire point of the poll is to get the community counting the days until Tyler1 has been banned for exactly 1 year. (April 30th, 2017)

I want to see if the community believes he shows signs of reform, if he can instead become a symbol of redemption, rather than toxicity.

Polls make this a far more interactive thread. I need Polls :( and I can't post it anywhere except Player Behavior and GD. But GD will never hit front page even if it becomes a popular thread :(

This is a pretty unique issue for sure. I've heard of some players being able to get passed an error 500 in the game client by using a VPN, so you could try that as well. It's not the best idea, but we could try using a different browser to at least be able to make the post as well.

Let me know if that helps out!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=G0v8wNyN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-24T20:57:56.220+0000)
>
> This is a pretty unique issue for sure. I've heard of some players being able to get passed an error 500 in the game client by using a VPN, so you could try that as well. It's not the best idea, but we could try using a different browser to at least be able to make the post as well.
> 
> Let me know if that helps out!

Are you low key telling me that my IP is being blacklisted for Poll posting? I will try the browser trick. However it should be noted that I have attempted this post both on PC and mobile, both with different IP's.

Your IP isn't necessarily being blacklisted, it just means that your connection might be sent through a less than optimal route to our servers. Using a VPN is just a solution that has worked in the past for some people, so let's be sure that doesn't work for you as well! 

If you're still having issues at that point, it would probably be best to submit a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech guys can take a closer look at what's going on.
